name: Tiny Road Hog !
description:
Tiny Road Hog ! is a runner where you drive a toy car through a road trip in the woods. Rewind the key on its top to start, and try to avoid obstacles on your road to get as far as you can. Then upgrade your car with nuts you collected and go even further !

• Controls :

          - PC : W / S or A / D to turn, SPACE to jump
          - Mobile : SWIPE  or use accelerometer to turn, TAP to jump

• Original team :

          - Valentin Boyaval : team leader, 3D artist
               →  https://www.artstation.com/cromach
               →  https://cromach.itch.io/

          - Quentin Eudeline : game designer, game programmer
               → https://www.artstation.com/quentineudeline

          - Maxime Hanot : programmer
              →  https://maximehanot.itch.io/

          - Valentin Liebaert : 3D artist
               →  https://www.artstation.com/liebaert
               → https://vliebaert.itch.io/

          - Émilien Massemin : 2D artist
               → https://www.artstation.com/emilien
               → https://itch.io/profile/emassemin

          - Axel Moulard : 2D artist
               → https://www.artstation.com/axel_moulard

          - Astrid Rotelli : technical artist
              → https://www.artstation.com/astridrotelli

On an original idea by Astrid Rotelli.
Remake by Quentin Eudeline (2 weeks), based on a 4th year unfinished school project.

Updates are to be expected(balancing, new environments, vehicles, features, ...) , stay tuned  !
